verbose_text: Structural analysis and molecular dynamics of alphaIIbbeta3 integrin revealed that force application by the actin cytoskeleton induced the high affinity conformation of alphaIIbbeta3 and reverted the affinity upon actin disassembly [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: integrin revealed that force application by the actin cytoskeleton induced the high affinity conformation of alphaIIbbeta3
